name: Nelson Mandela Adult tee (one-sided)
description:
This gorgeous two-color print of the great man and one of his most inspiring quotes: "It always seems impossible until it is done," 

with Mandela's signature, has been designed and handprinted by Oakland artist Barbara Sandidge on a sturdy short sleeve tee, available in S, M and L. Indicate size desired via the contact form.

name: Nelson Mandela Two-sided Adult tee (front)
description:
One of Nelson Mandela's most inspiring quotes on the front, over the heart, "It always seems impossible until it is done," 

with Mandela's signature, designed and handprinted by Oakland artist Barbara Sandidge to accompany the large format portrait on the back. 

Available in S, M and L. Indicate size desired via the contact form.

name: Nelson Mandela Two-sided Adult tee (back)
description:
The great man immortalized and handprinted by Oakland artist Barbara Sandidge in this gorgeous portrait on the back of a tee shirt, which hosts one of Mandela's most inspiring quotes on the front:  "It always seems impossible until it is done,"

with Mandela's signature. 

Available in S, M and L. Indicate size desired via the contact form.

name: Nelson Mandela Youth long sleeve tee (back)
description: The back of this beautiful long sleeve tee designed and printed for years by long time Oakland artist Barbara Sandidge is Mandela's signature and a handprint that contains the silhouette of Africa.

name: Nelson Mandela Youth long sleeve tee (front) + Maze 'n Craze cap
description:
Ocean Mandela Milan, 11, named for the great man, wears the Nelson Mandela long sleeve tee designed and printed by long time Oakland artist Barbara Sandidge.

Ocean is also wearing Barbara's Maze 'n Craze label baseball cap. Hot! Add this item to your cart and get the Maze 'n Craze cap (a $12 value) and youth tee together for just $22.50
